FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore our collection of trendy and fashionable bags that perfectly complement any outfit.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Crafted from high-quality materials, our bags are built to withstand the rigors of daily use.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Whether you need a sleek tote for work, a spacious backpack for travel, or a chic clutch for nights out, we have something for every occasion.

FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our bag app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of bags does the app cover?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app includes information and features for all kinds of bags - handbags, backpacks, luggage, totes, and more.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I buy bags through the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: No, this is not an e-commerce app. It's designed to help you organize, care for, and get the most out of the bags you already own.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How can I keep track of my bag collection?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: You can create a virtual closet to catalog all your bags, add photos, notes, purchase details, and more for easy reference.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Does the app provide cleaning tips?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, we offer guidance on proper cleaning and conditioning methods for different bag materials like leather, canvas, etc.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: The app allows you to set reminders for cleaning/conditioning, has a 'look book' for outfit inspiration, and a community forum to connect with other bag lovers.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about The Bag App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: The Bag App is a revolutionary mobile application designed to help you organize and manage all your bags and accessories in one convenient place.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The app allows you to catalog your bags, create packing lists, get outfit suggestions based on your bags, and even find nearby stores that sell bags and accessories.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Simply download The Bag App from your app store, create an account, and start adding your bags to your virtual closet.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, The Bag App is completely free to download and use. However, there are optional in-app purchases for premium features and styling services.

LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing the ultimate solution for bag lovers
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Organize Your Bags, Simplify Your Life
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our app is designed to help you keep track of your bag collection, plan outfits, and find the perfect bag for any occasion.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app helps you organize and catalog your collection of bags, from trendy totes to luxury luggage.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Never lose track of your favorite bags again. Our app lets you log details like purchase date, cost, and condition.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Join our community of bag enthusiasts. Share photos, get care tips, and discover new brands to covet.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Simplify your life, one bag at a time.
CTA_BODY: Experience the ultimate in convenience and style with our innovative bag app. Designed to streamline your life, it offers seamless organization and access to your essentials, wherever you go.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it. Hear from some of our happy customers.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has made packing for trips so much easier. I can instantly see what's in each of my bags and make sure I have everything I need.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a busy mom, this app helps me keep all my different bags organized and ready to go. No more frantic searches for missing items!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love being able to easily transfer items between my different bags with just a few taps. It's revolutionized how I pack.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Organize Your Bags, Simplify Your Life
